name: It
summary_text: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy.

name: Trishna
summary_text: The story of the tragic relationship between the son of a property developer and the daughter of an auto rickshaw owner.

name: West Is West
summary_text: An immigrant father decides to take his truant son back to the old country.

name: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
summary_text: A commitment-phobe agrees to marry his girlfriend, setting in motion a series of hilarious mishaps that has him questioning what he got himself into.

name: Elvira's Haunted Hills
summary_text: Spooky high jinks abound when Elvira finds herself spending the night in a mysterious castle en route to 1851 Paris.

name: April Captains
summary_text: Story of the 1974 coup that overthrew the right-wing Portuguese dictatorship--which continued the fascist policies of long-time dictator Antonio Salazar--and of two young army captains who were involved in it.

name: The Lower Depths
summary_text: A charismatic thief makes friends with a bankrupt baron who comes to live in the thief's slum. Meanwhile the thief seeks the love of a young woman, who is held emotionally captive by her slumlord family.

name: R.I.P.
summary_text: Set in Chellanam, Kochi, the story of Ee. Ma. Yau revolves around the death of Vavachan Mesthiri in a coastal village. It showcases the events that unfold between two evenings and looks at death from different perspectives.

name: The Drowning
summary_text: A psychiatrist faces his past, present and future when he finds himself involved in the treatment of a young man recently released from prison for a murder committed when the boy was just 11 years old.

name: Mega Shark vs. Mecha Shark
summary_text: A new mega shark threatens to destroy humanity. The government creates an exact robotic copy of the shark, either equal to or greater than the original. Now they must fight to the death while people and whole cities get in the way.

name: Anegan
summary_text: Madhu, an animator, gets thoughts about her past life, but her psychiatrist believes it to be a figment of her imagination. Madhu happens to meet Ashwin, the man she was in love with in her past life.

name: Absolon
summary_text: In a world ravaged by disease, he's the only cure... and the last hope for human-kind.

name: Assassination Tango
summary_text: An aging hitman gets a contract to kill a General in Buenos Aires, Argentina. But when his mark becomes unavailable, he becomes involved in Argentinian tango culture.

name: Kilibik
summary_text: Juvenalian satire comedy adapted from stage features a withdrawn family man who just doesn't respond to anything done to him. Only until a serial killer steals his driver's licence and the family man is mistaken as a serial killer.

name: The Boys in Company C
summary_text: In 1967, five young men undergo boot camp training before being shipped out to Vietnam. Once they get there, the experience proves worse than they could have imagined.

name: Jupiter's Moon
summary_text: Aryan is a Syrian refugee trying to make his way into Hungary from Serbia, along with his father and many other wretched souls. They are all caught, and find themselves in a web of cynicism and corruption.

name: Variações: Guardian Angel
summary_text: A biopic about António Variações, a famous Portuguese pop rock singer from the 80s who died from AIDS-related complications in 1984.

name: Yôgisha X no kenshin
summary_text: It's another battle of the wits for the brilliant but eccentric physicist, Yukawa, and detective, Kaoru.

name: Crawlspace
summary_text: A man who runs an apartment house for women is the demented son of a Nazi surgeon who has the house equipped with secret passageways, hidden rooms and torture and murder devices.

name: Loufa kai parallagi: Seirines sto Aigaio
summary_text: A group of Greek solders, who serve their military service in Kos, is sent to guard the skerry of Pitta. Everything looked normal until a Turkish boat disembarks 4 castaways on Pitta.

name: Flatfoot in Hong Kong
summary_text: In the Far-East, Italian police inspector Rizzo and American mobster Frank Barella co-operate in finding clues about the identity of a dirty cop in Rizzo's narcotics department.

name: Standing Up
summary_text: Two kids befriend each other after being left stripped nude in a lake as the victims of an immature summer camp prank. They run away from camp and for three days learn more about each other than they've ever known before.
When reporters are granted access to Area 51 Air Force base, a breach of security turns the protected government base into a horrifying destination of terror.

name: Just Sex and Nothing Else
summary_text: Dora rejects all men when she discovers that her fiance has been living a double life with another women throughout their relationship (he was married). But with her biological clock ...                See full summary »

name: Shigatsu monogatari
summary_text: In spring, a young girl leaves the island of Hokkaido to attend university in Tokyo.

name: Gamera: Guardian of the Universe
summary_text: A hibernating species of giant carnivorous birds is awakened on a Japanese island shortly after the military encounters an unidentified mass moving beneath the water off-shore.

name: Porcile
summary_text: A man wandering in a volcanic desert forms a band of murderous cannibals. A post-war German industrialist learns that his son is unable to make decisions or form relationships.

name: Dragon Nest: Warriors' Dawn
summary_text: Lambert joins the Dragon Slayers' League to save Altera from the Black Dragon.

name: Pyaar Impossible!
summary_text: Everybody loves beautiful Alisha and it's no surprise that nerdy Abhay loves her too but she doesn't know he exists until years later their paths cross.

name: Wrong Move
summary_text: A writer goes on a road trip across West Germany with a group of eclectic people he meets along the way.

name: The Time of Their Lives
summary_text: A psychiatrist stays in a mansion haunted by prankish ghosts from the Revolutionary War.

name: Almost Human
summary_text: Mark Fisher disappeared from his home in a brilliant flash of blue light almost 2 years ago. His friend Seth Hampton was the last to see him alive. Now a string of grisly, violent murders ...                See full summary »

name: When Pigs Have Wings

name: Little Deaths
summary_text: Composed of three disturbingly sensual and terrifying short narratives, unified by the twin themes of sex and death.

name: Macabre
summary_text: Two newly weds Adjie and Astrid, along with 3 of their best friends decided to have an interstate road trip as a last attempt to reconcile Adjie with his estranged little sister Ladya. ...                See full summary »

name: Mother's Boys
summary_text: Jude Madigan abandons her husband Robert and her three sons without any explanation. Three years later Jude inexplicably returns to reunite her family. However Robert and his new lover ...                See full summary »

name: Mrs. Soffel
summary_text: Diane Keaton stars as a prison warden's wife who falls in love with a death row convict (Mel Gibson.) Believing he's innocent, she helps him and his convicted brother escape.

name: Air Force
summary_text: The crew of an Air Force bomber arrives in Pearl Harbor in the aftermath of the Japanese attack and is sent on to Manila to help with the defense of the Philippines.

name: The Crime of Monsieur Lange
summary_text: The boss of a publishing company is a womanizer and a jerk, but what would happen if he suddenly disappeared?

name: Jasper Jones
summary_text: JASPER JONES is a coming of age story about Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14. On the night that Jasper Jones, the town's mixed race outcast shows him the dead body of young Laura ...                See full summary »

name: Wahed men el nas
summary_text: Mahmoud (Karim Abdel Aziz), is a poor but a hard working parking attendant who lives a happy and calm life with his father and wife Mona (Menna Shalaby) who is pregnant in their first baby ...                See full summary »

name: Twin Sitters
summary_text: A business executive is releasing dangerous toxins and the Barbarian Brothers set out to stop his evil work.

name: Quintet
summary_text: During a future ice age, dying humanity occupies its remaining time by playing a board game called "Quintet." For one small group, this obsession is not enough; they play the game with living pieces ... and only the winner survives.

name: Emmanuelle II
summary_text: After two months of separation, Emmanuelle must find her husband Jean in Hong Kong. She goes there by boat. Once in Thailand, she finds her husband and meets Christopher, a mysterious ...                See full summary »

name: The Rain People
summary_text: When a housewife finds out she is pregnant, she runs out of town looking for freedom to reevaluate her life decisions.

name: The Phantom Tollbooth
summary_text: Milo is a boy who is bored with life. One day he comes home to find a toll booth in his room. Having nothing better to do, he gets in his toy car and drives through - only to emerge in a world full of adventure.

name: Hate Story 3
summary_text: Siya appears to be the bone of contention between warring businessmen Aditya and Saurav. But this one runs deeper than your average love triangle.

name: Close Your Eyes
summary_text: A hypnotherapist is caught up in the pursuit of a serial killer.

name: Andhaghaaram
summary_text: As a blind librarian, dispirited cricketer and desolate psychiatrist each seek retribution and release, their lives overlap under eerie influences.

name: El Nazer
summary_text: Salah eldin inherit administration of a school from his father, but he abusive its management due to his lack of experience.

name: The Lineup
summary_text: In San Francisco, a psychopathic gangster and his mentor retrieve heroin packages carried by unsuspecting travelers.

name: Extraordinary Tales
summary_text: An animated anthology of five tales adapted from Edgar Allan Poe's stories.

name: Night in Paradise
summary_text: Hiding out in Jeju Island following a brutal tragedy, a wronged mobster with a target on his back connects with a woman who has her own demons.

name: I Come with the Rain
summary_text: Ex-Los Angeles cop turned private eye travels to Hong Kong in search of the missing son of a billionaire.

name: Nightwatching
summary_text: An extravagant, exotic and moving look at Rembrandt's romantic and professional life, and the controversy he created by the identification of a murderer in the painting 'The Night Watch'.

name: Rembrandt
summary_text: Mick and Tom are an unlikely father-son team of petty thieves. They've been hired to steal a painting from a museum. By accident, they steal the wrong painting: Denmark's only original Rembrandt masterpiece, worth millions.

name: La fleur du mal
summary_text: Three generations of a wealthy Bordeaux family are caught in the crossfire when Anne decides to run for mayor, thanks to a political pamphlet that revives an old murder scandal.

name: The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
summary_text: A tug-of-war between Elmo and his friend sends his blanket to faraway Grouchland, a place full of grouchy creatures and the villainous Huxley. Elmo embarks on a rescue mission, learning important lessons about sharing and responsibility.

name: Daniel Tosh: Completely Serious
summary_text: Comedy's chosen one, Daniel Tosh, has been healing the sick, stopping wars, helping underprivileged children... and filming Completely Serious, the single greatest hour in comedy. What have...                See full summary »

name: Oci ciornie
summary_text: An Italian tells his story of love to a Russian. In a series of flashbacks, Romano Patroni leaves his wife to visit a spa where he falls in love with a Russian woman. He returns to Italy resolved to leave his wife and marry his love.

name: The Sandpiper
summary_text: A free-spirited single mother forms a connection with the wedded headmaster of an Episcopalian boarding school in Monterey, California.

name: Table for Three
summary_text: A suddenly single guy invites what he thinks is a perfect couple to move into his apartment, only to discover they quickly insert themselves into all aspects of his life.

name: American Gun
summary_text: Seemingly disparate portraits of people -- among them a single mother, a high school principal, and an ace student -- Distinctly American -- all affected by the proliferation of guns in American society.

name: Exils
summary_text: Two French lovers, Zano and Naima, decided to travel to the land of their parents: Algeria. Their road trip gradually becomes a spiritual quest.

name: Vokzal dlya dvoikh
summary_text: A waitress from the provincial railway station falls in love with an accidental passenger. Before this passenger lies the menace of distant prison for the crime he didn't commit.

summary_text: Two adventurers and best friends, Roland and Manu, are the victims of a practical joke that costs Manu his pilot's license. With seeming contrition, the jokesters tell Roland and Manu about...                See full summary »

name: Sorry Angel
summary_text: Jacques is an older writer from Paris. Arthur is a young student in Rennes. They instantly fall in love. But they'll have to face rejection and sickness to keep it that way.

name: Two Lives
summary_text: As the Berlin Wall crumbles, Katrine, the daughter of a Norwegian woman and a German occupation soldier, finds her idyllic life disrupted as she refuses to testify a trial against the Norwegian state on behalf of her fellow "war children."

name: Bianca
summary_text: Michele is a mathematics professor who just started a new job in a school with some peculiar teaching methods. After a woman in his neighborhood is murdered, Michele meets beautiful ...                See full summary »

name: Nord
summary_text: NORTH Following a nervous breakdown, ski athlete Jomar has isolated himself in a lonely existence as the guard of a ski park. When he learns that he might be the father of a child way up ...                See full summary »

name: Beastmaster 2: Through the Portal of Time
summary_text: Dar is a warrior who can talk to the beasts. He is forced to travel to Earth to stop his evil brother from stealing an atomic bomb and turning their native land from a desert into, well - a desert.

name: Zombie Lake
summary_text: In a small village, somewhere in France, German soldiers, killed and thrown into the lake by the Resistance during WW II, come back.

name: The 1,000 Eyes of Dr. Mabuse
summary_text: In 1960s Germany, criminal mastermind Dr. Mabuse uses hypnotized victims and the surveillance equipment of a Nazi-era bugged hotel to steal nuclear technology from a visiting American industrialist.

name: The Bride Came C.O.D.
summary_text: A financially-strapped charter pilot hires himself to an oil tycoon to kidnap his madcap daughter and prevent her from marrying a vapid band leader.

name: Leonera
summary_text: An incarcerated woman struggles to raise her son from prison.

name: Miss Hokusai
summary_text: The life and works of Japanese artist and ukiyo-e painter Katsushika Hokusai, as seen from the eyes of his daughter, Katsushika O-Ei.

name: The Makeover
summary_text: After losing election for US Congress, the well spoken Hannah coaches a beer vendor for the position as he, contrary to Hannah, has a likable personality. Can they learn from each other?

name: Süt
summary_text: Yusuff has a hard time defining his adulthood. In one hand, there are his mother's expectations while on the other hand his passions.

name: Threat Level Midnight: The Movie
summary_text: After secret agent Michael Scarn (played by Steve Carell) is forced into retirement due to the death of his wife Catherine Zeta-Scarn, the President of the United States of America (played ...                See full summary »

name: Angrej
summary_text: A thoughtful young man struggles to find a woman to marry.

name: Force of Execution
summary_text: A crime boss sends his top man to kill a prisoner. He gets the wrong man and pays the price. 6 months later he's back on his feet. His ex boss is now being squeezed out by Ice Man, who's responsible for the "wrong man" deal.

name: Brick Lane
summary_text: In 1980s London, Nazneem, a young Bangladeshi woman, feels her soul is quietly dying in her arranged marriage, until the day hot-headed Karim comes knocking at her door.

name: Wing Chun
summary_text: Wing Chun's village is yet again being plundered by bandits. This time she uses kung fu to defeat them. The fighting doesn't end here.

name: A Home of Our Own
summary_text: Widow Frances Lacey is being sexually harassed by her boss while she tries to provide for her brood of six children. Also, her oldest son, Shayne, is constantly in trouble. When she's fired from her job, she decides to abandon Los Angeles.

name: Aladdin
summary_text: Updating of the old "Aladdin" Arabian Nights tale, as a teenager in modern-day Miami finds a magic lantern and out pops a genie, who's been asleep for 200 years and in his gratitude grants the boy several wishes.

name: Show Boat
summary_text: Despite her mother's objections, the naive young daughter of a show boat captain is thrust into the limelight as the company's new leading lady.

name: Maze
summary_text: Inspired by the true events of the infamous 1983 prison breakout of 38 IRA prisoners from HMP, which was to become the biggest prison escape in Europe since World War II.

name: Eating Out: All You Can Eat
summary_text: A gay Internet connection is made, but entanglements ensue due to hiding behind the name and photo of a straight male stripper who happens to return to the area.

name: The Grass Harp
summary_text: Becoming an orphan in 1935, Collin moves to his dad's cousins Verena and Dolly. Verena is a rich, bossy businesswoman. Dolly, Collin and the maid revolt, moving to a tree house.

name: The Wave
summary_text: An experiment in an American High School where students learn how easy it is to be seduced by the same social forces which led to the horrors of Nazi Germany. Based on a true story.

name: Worlds Apart
summary_text: The daughter of a Jehovah's Witness is forced to choose between religion and love when she falls for someone outside her faith.

name: Yella
summary_text: Yella is estranged from her possessive and violent husband; but he can't quite bring himself to give her up. When their fraught interaction finally comes to dramatic conclusion, Yella's life takes an odd shift.

name: The Best Intentions
summary_text: In 1909, poor theology student Henrik falls in love with Anna, the intelligent daughter of a rich family in Uppsala. After marrying Henrik becomes a priest in northern Sweden. Urbane Anna hates living in the county, growing restless.

name: R.O.T.O.R.
summary_text: Robotic Officer Tactical Operation Research. A prototype robot intended for crime combat escapes from the development lab and goes on a killing rampage.

name: Assassination
summary_text: A presidential bodyguard is assigned to protect an objecting first lady, as repeated attempts are made on her life.

name: Lulu the Tool
summary_text: A conscientious factory worker gets his finger cut off by a machine. Although the physical handicap is not serious, the accident causes him to become more involved in political and revolutionary groups.

name: Sunlight Jr.
summary_text: A Florida couple deals with an unexpected pregnancy while holding minimum wage jobs.

name: High Security Vacation
summary_text: Two prisoners, who have escaped from prison, hate each other. But subsequent circumstances make them reunite and deal with all the problems: from kids to gangsters.

name: November
summary_text: Sophie Jacobs is going through the most difficult time of her life. Now, she just has to find out if it's real.

name: Deadfall
summary_text: When Joe loses his dad in a sting, he contacts his dad's twin, Lou, who has a major sting planned. Lou's helper feels threatened by Joe. Who's conning who?

name: Everybody's All-American
summary_text: A Louisiana football legend struggles to deal with life's complexities after his college career is over.

name: Hammett
summary_text: Fictional account of real-life mystery writer Dashiell Hammett, and his involvement in the investigation of a beautiful Chinese cabaret actress' mysterious disappearance in San Francisco.

name: The Simple-Minded Murderer
summary_text: A mentally challenged man escapes from his tyrannical master and finds happiness when a poor family takes him in.

name: Attack of the Crab Monsters
summary_text: Scientists become trapped on a shrinking island with intelligent, murderous giant crabs.

name: A Lesson in Love
summary_text: After a 15-year marriage, the spouses are going to divorce, but suddenly find out that their feelings have not vanished yet.

summary_text: A suburban couple decide to shake up their marriage by "swinging" with another couple.

name: A Boyfriend for Christmas
summary_text: On Christmas Day, Santa brings two lonely people together. But can love overcome deception?

name: Adam & Steve
summary_text: Follows two New York city couples -- one heterosexual and one gay who explore the peaks and the valleys of their respective relationships.

name: Farewell, Friend
summary_text: After an overseas deployment, two former French Foreign Legion members plan to break into the vault of a French corporation.

name: Ted - Show Me Love

name: Aziz Ansari Live in Madison Square Garden
summary_text: Stand-up comedian and TV star Aziz Ansari delivers his sharp witted take on immigrants, relationships and the food industry.

name: Spirtokouto

summary_text: An eccentric scientist teaches a student in his own manner while he looks for a way to clone his deceased wife.

name: Bedeviled
summary_text: Five friends are terrorized by a supernatural entity after downloading a mysterious app.

name: Iraivi
summary_text: A drama about an alcoholic filmmaker and his friends who bring trouble to the women in their lives.

name: Heal the Living
summary_text: A single devastating event intertwines inextricably the lives of an unfortunate teenager, a weary woman with a critical degenerative heart condition and a team of compassionate doctors; all perfect strangers, perfectly interconnected.

name: The Pirates
summary_text: A band of pirates and a group of bandits fight to catch a gray whale that has swallowed a royal stamp.

name: Lost in Paris

summary_text: Forging his own comedic boundaries, Anthony Jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in New York.

name: Davaci
summary_text: It is a comedy of stubborn people who initiate a judicial process which would last 7 years because some sheep ate a few cabbages.

name: The American Astronaut
summary_text: Samuel Curtis, an interplanetary trader, sets forth through a rustic and remote solar system, unaware that his old friend Professor Hess is trying to kill him.

summary_text: Through Georgi (a juvenile) and Itso (an adult), we take a quick glance (about one and a half hour quick) at what happens in post cold-war Bulgaria.

summary_text: A soldiers trapped inside a church as last refugee. A fight that no one couldn't win. A war that no one wanted to lose.

name: Spiral
summary_text: A same-sex couple move to a small town to enjoy a better quality of life and raise their daughter with strong social values. But when neighbors throw a very strange party, nothing is as it seems in their picturesque neighborhood.

name: The Ballad of Narayama
summary_text: A kabuki theatre-inflected story about a poor village whose people have to be carried to a nearby mountain to die once they get old.

name: Christmas with Holly

name: A Secret
summary_text: A 15-year-old boy unearths a shocking family secret.

name: Tart
summary_text: A portrait of the increasingly desperate attempts of a teenage Manhattan girl to find love and kinship, in a world that never reciprocates.

summary_text: A widowed man's life turns upside down when he embarks on a journey to find a dying man's long lost love.

name: Tevar

summary_text: A brilliant detective is forced into early retirement after losing eyesight. Making ends meet by solving cold cases for reward money, he teams up with a rookie lady inspector to solve a case from her personal past.

summary_text: Turkish tragicomedy of the legendary Bloody Mary depicts how an ingenue is driven into adultery and is happened to suffer from early puberty until she ends up as a harlot. This is when she decides to take revenge from all the men on Earth.

summary_text: The misadventures of a ragtag group of elderly Home Guard local defense volunteers at the onset of WW2.

name: Wickie und die starken Männer

summary_text: A man (Bentley) who makes his living composing other people's suicide notes enters into a romance with the sister (Ryder) of a recent client.

summary_text: A man suspects his wife of being unfaithful, but he's not prepared for what her confession will do to him.

name: Kickboxer 3: The Art of War
summary_text: David Sloan travels to Rio for a kick-box exhibition. There he saves two youngsters and stops a white slaver.

name: This Land Is Mine
summary_text: A mild-mannered school teacher in a Nazi-occupied town during WWII finds himself torn between collaboration and resistance.

name: Jeon Woochi
summary_text: Jeon Woo-chi, an undisciplined womanizing Taoist from the Joseon era, ends up in present day Korea causing mayhem with his knack for magic.

name: Life After People
summary_text: Visit the ghostly villages surrounding Chernobyl (abandoned by humans after the 1986 nuclear disaster), travel to remote islands off the coast of Maine to search for abandoned towns that ...                See full summary »

name: Wah-Wah
summary_text: Ralph witnesses the disintegration of his parents' marriage through adultery and alcohol during the last gasp of the British Empire in Swaziland in 1969. Ralph finds his new step-mother is the only one who understands his inner turmoil.

name: Sadma
summary_text: A head injury causes a woman to regresses to childhood. Lost and confused, she is eventually befriended by a school teacher.

name: U Turn
summary_text: A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.

name: Judy Moody and the Not Bummer Summer
summary_text: Third grader Judy Moody sets out to have the most thrilling summer of her life.

name: The Merry Gentleman
summary_text: A woman leaves an abusive husband to start a new life in Chicago, where she befriends a man undergoing an emotional crisis, who she does not know is a professional killer, and a detective, who is investigating the hit man.

name: Crime + Punishment in Suburbia
summary_text: A darkly romantic story of murder and redemption, set against an eerily familiar American landscape.

name: The Prodigal Son
summary_text: Sammo Hung's (Martial Law) crowning achievement, The Prodigal Son introduces the new fluid concept of the Wing Tsun style at its most captivating.

name: The Detective
summary_text: Police detective Joe Leland investigates the murder of a gay man. While investigating, he discovers links to official corruption in New York City in this drama that delves into a world of sex and drugs.

name: Terraferma
summary_text: A Sicilian family deals with the arrival of a group of immigrants on their island.

name: Man Trouble
summary_text: A sleazy but affable guard dog trainer is blackmailed to steal a manuscript for a tell-all book from one of his clients.

name: Young Doctors in Love
summary_text: It's a spoof on hospital soap operas with a few gangsters thrown in. A new batch of interns begins at City Hospital.

name: The State of Things
summary_text: On location in Portugal, a film crew runs out of film while making their own version of Roger Corman's Day the World Ended (1955). The producer is nowhere to be found and director Friedrich...                See full summary »

name: A Good Marriage
summary_text: Sabine vows to give up married lovers, and is determined to find a good husband. Her best friend Clarisse introduces her to her cousin Edmond, a busy lawyer from Paris. Sabine pursues ...                See full summary »

name: Jud Süß
summary_text: Infamous anti-Semitic Nazi propaganda historical drama about Duke Karl Alexander of Württemberg and his treasurer Süß Oppenheimer.

name: The Devil's Doorway
summary_text: In the fall of 1960, Father Thomas Riley and Father John Thornton were sent by the Vatican to investigate a miraculous event in an Irish home for 'fallen women', only to uncover something much more horrific.

name: Toro
summary_text: A former con man must be back to his old habits to save his older brother and niece from his ex boss and mentor.

name: Farsan
summary_text: A heartwarming tale about a beloved father who is trying to cope with cultural clashes, loss and the search for love in average Swedish society.

name: Wishing Stairs
summary_text: A staircase leading to the dormitory of a remote boarding school usually has 28 stairs, but every so often there appears to be 29. When someone steps on the mysterious extra stair, the horror begins

name: The Voyeur
summary_text: A troubled college professor becomes obsessed with the idea that his emotionally distant wife is having an affair with his invalid father.

name: Jawani Phir Nahi Ani
summary_text: A single divorce lawyer takes his three married friends on a vacation to escape their wives.

name: Jack's Back
summary_text: A serial killer in Los Angeles celebrates Jack the Ripper's 100th birthday by committing similar murders and only one has a chance of stopping him.

name: City Girl
summary_text: A Chicago waitress falls in love with a Minnesota farmer, and decides to face a life in the country.

name: Gnome Alone
summary_text: When Chloe discovers that her new home's garden gnomes are not what they seem, she must decide between the pursuit of a desired high school life and taking up the fight against the Troggs.

name: Girl in the Basement
summary_text: Sara is a teen girl who is looking forward to her 18th birthday to move away from her controlling father Don. But before she could even blow out the candles, Don imprisons her in the basement of their home.

summary_text: Hopefully on the verge of curing his Hulk condition, Banner meets his colleague, Don Blake, who is mystically linked to a Viking warrior, Thor.

summary_text: Our hero Naruto is caught in special chakra that propels him into the past. He finds himself in the City of Loran. As he encounters strange things, can he save the future with the past?

name: The Whisperer in Darkness
summary_text: Based on the H. P. Lovecraft story of the same name, a folklorist investigates reports of unusual creatures in Vermont only to uncover more than he bargained for

name: Nadja
summary_text: This ultra-hip, post-modern vampire tale is set in contemporary New York City. Members of a dysfunctional family of vampires are trying to come to terms with each other, in the wake of ...                See full summary »

name: Hercules and the Amazon Women
summary_text: Hercules and Iolaus take time out from Iolaus' wedding preparations, to help a distant village under attack from "monsters". When they reach their destination, they find the monsters are in...                See full summary »

name: Thackeray
summary_text: From controversial cartoonist to powerful Mumbai politician, this biopic maps the meteoric rise of far-right Shiv Sena party founder, Bal Thackeray.

name: Love Ranch
summary_text: A drama centered around a married couple who opened the first legal brothel in Nevada.

name: Just Add Water
summary_text: An offbeat romantic comedy about a decent guy, Ray Tuckby, with a dead-end life in the dead-end town of Trona, CA. After encouragement from a stranger whom he happens upon, Ray begins to dream again. He sheds the parasites in his life, musters the nerve to pursue his childhood love, and finally takes back his community by toppling the local teenage Meth-baron.

name: The Fourth Angel
summary_text: A man seeks justice after his wife and two daughters are gunned down in a terrorist attack.

name: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
summary_text: Set to win back her fiance's heart, Sanjana (Kajol) decides to travel back to India but little did she know that fate had something else planned for her.

name: The Long Day Closes
summary_text: A young British boy comes of age among his loving family and the austere Catholic Church as he realizes his love of cinema and his homosexuality.

name: The Night Strangler
summary_text: A reporter hunts down a 144-year old alchemist who is killing women for their blood.

name: Testament of Orpheus
summary_text: The Poet looks back over his life and work, recalling his inspirations and obsessions.

name: The Fighting Kentuckian
summary_text: In 1818 Alabama, French settlers are pitted against greedy land-grabber Blake Randolph but Kentucky militiaman John Breen, who's smitten with French gal Fleurette De Marchand, comes to the settlers' aid.

name: Airplane Mode
summary_text: Horny American teenagers fly to Australia for sex at the social media convention in Sydney. Will Logan survive his fear of flying? Will the pilots survive passengers not using airplane mode? Will anyone survive?

name: Niyazi Gül Dörtnala
summary_text: Niyazi, a veterinarian, is on the lookout for a special elixir for animals. What he doesn't yet know is a mobster and his estranged love is also on the lookout for that elixir.

name: Mafiya: Igra na vyzhivanie
summary_text: Moscow, 2072. Twelve contestants, each with their own story and motives, play a televised game of Mafia. Those eliminated must enter a virtual reality to conquer their worst fear - or die trying.

name: Prag
summary_text: Christoffer and Maja's trip to Prague to bring back Chistoffer's deceased father evolves into the story of a break-up. In the wake of the events that follow, secrets gradually emerge which threaten to destroy their marriage.

name: Zakhm
summary_text: Amidst religious riots, a son deals with his mother's life-threatening injuries, and her last request.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: An acid-scarred composer has his dwarf helper bring an opera singer to his London sewer hide-out.

name: Commando 2
summary_text: Commando Karan uses his combat skills to eradicate black money, which has been siphoned to banks abroad.

name: Sadako vs. Kayako
summary_text: The vengeful spirits of the Ring and Grudge series face off.

name: Sonny Boy
summary_text: Forbidden love.

name: Madhouse
summary_text: The luxurious villa of yuppie couple Mark and Jessie Bannister is overrun by loads of uninvited guests who turn the house upside-down and nearly destroy it.

name: Gheisar
summary_text: A young man's drive to avenge for his sister and brother.

name: Roberta
summary_text: An American jazzman and his buddy woo a Russian princess and a fake countess in Paris.

name: After Midnight
summary_text: When his girlfriend suddenly disappears, leaving a cryptic note as her only explanation, Hank's comfortable life and his sanity begin to crack. Then, from the woods surrounding his house, something terrible starts trying to break in.

name: The Forbidden Room
summary_text: In this non-linear amalgamation, submarine crewmen and a woodsman wend their way through a voyage of odd experiences.

name: Les gamins
summary_text: A young, frustrated musician finds unexpected kinship with his girlfriend's father.

name: Johan Falk: Kodnamn: Lisa
summary_text: Frank Wagner is sleeping next to his family. Their plans to move abroad lay on the kitchen table, when they suddenly hear someone trying to break into the apartment and five masked men are trying to enter.

name: Tadas Blinda. Pradzia
summary_text: A romance blooms between a noblewoman and a common man amid a peasant revolt against the brutal Russian army

name: How to Make Love to a Woman
summary_text: When Andy hears his girlfriend Lauren sigh after sex, he panics. After getting fruitless help from friends, porn stars and tantric experts, he finally realizes that in order to give Lauren the "O" word, he first needs to say the "L" word.

name: Heavy Traffic
summary_text: An "underground" cartoonist contends with life in the inner city, where various unsavory characters serve as inspiration for his artwork.

name: Brahmotsavam
summary_text: To consolidate his position in the family, a man tries to arrange a marriage for his daughter, but the suitable boy he has in mind is already in love with another.

name: Fear(s) of the Dark
summary_text: Several scary black-and-white animated segments in different styles appeal to our fear(s) of the dark.

name: L'esquive
summary_text: Krimo a 15 years old shy boy falls in love for Lídia who is his classmate.To be able to assume his love for her he decides to take a part in the play that was to be one of his friends.

name: Nightmares
summary_text: Anthology of four horror tales with a supernatural twist based on urban legends.

name: Reaching for the Moon
summary_text: A chronicle of the tragic love affair between American poet Elizabeth Bishop and Brazilian architect Lota de Macedo Soares.

name: The Rocket
summary_text: Laos. In a land ravaged by war and exploitation, a boy whose family believe he is cursed must redeem himself by taking part in a dangerous rocket competition.

name: Adam & Paul
summary_text: 2 heroin addicts negotiate their way through Dublin's city centre, encountering friends and family as they search for their next fix.

name: From Vegas to Macau III
summary_text: Ken is holding a wedding ceremony in Macau for her daughter, Rainbow, who is marrying his protege, Vincent. Ken's best buddies, Vic and Mark, are invited to the wedding. On the wedding day ...                See full summary »

name: The Notebook
summary_text: Twin siblings enduring the harshness of WWII in a village on the Hungarian border hedge their survival on studying and learning from the evil surrounding them.

name: Game of Death II
summary_text: After Billy Lo is killed while seeking the murderers of his friend, his brother Bobby goes all out to bring the perpetrators to justice.

name: Age of Consent
summary_text: A grizzled Australian painter decides to jolt his stale creativity by moving to a remote island on the Great Barrier Reef, where he takes on an alluring, uninhibited young woman as his muse.

name: A Call to Spy
summary_text: In the beginning of WWII, with Britain becoming desperate, Churchill orders his new spy agency - SOE - to recruit and train women as spies.

name: Chelovek s bulvara Kaputsinov
summary_text: Mr Jonny First arrives to the Wild West to present the art of the Cinematograph.

name: Screwballs
summary_text: Frolicking youth comedy about zany high school students set in the 1960s.

name: The Breaking Point
summary_text: An otherwise moral captain of a charter boat becomes financially strapped and is drawn into illegal activities in order to keep up payments on his boat.

name: Chronic
summary_text: A home care nurse works with terminally ill patients.

name: The Grace Card
summary_text: Everything can change in an instant, and take a lifetime to unravel. Every day, we have the opportunity to rebuild relationships by extending and receiving God's grace. Offer The Grace Card, and never underestimate the power of God's love.

name: Aprile
summary_text: Nanni Moretti takes a comic look at the ebbs and flows of his life as he becomes a father for the first time. He struggles with distractions while trying to make a documentary of the Italian national elections.

name: The Butterfly Ball
summary_text: Roger Glover puts on a star-studded concert at the Royal Albert Hall for his concept album "The Butterfly Ball and the Grasshopper's Feast".

name: Tad, the Lost Explorer, and the Secret of King Midas
summary_text: Tad Jones, the most awkward explorer, must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas' necklace.
